original_text: As Jesus and his disciples were on their way, he came to a village where a woman named Martha opened her home to him.
korean_text: 그들이 길 갈 때에 예수께서 한 마을에 들어가시매 마르다라 이름하는 한 여자가 자기 집으로 영접하더라

sentences.original_text: As Jesus and his disciples were on their way,
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님과 제자들이 길을 가고 있을 때,
